text.last_approved_text: In the defence of their prince, these warriors shall ride to whatever end.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In the defence of their prince, these warriors shall ride to whatever end.

text.last_approved_text: Generations of warriors have served with pride and fury in the household cavalry. It is an institution beyond repute.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Generations of warriors have served with pride and fury in the household cavalry. It is an institution beyond repute.

text.last_approved_text: When you fight to live, you tend to become exceedingly good at it.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When you fight to live, you tend to become exceedingly good at it.

text.last_approved_text: The message the Yellow Turbans deliver is one of justice over corruption, with thundering hooves and furious charge.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The message the Yellow Turbans deliver is one of justice over corruption, with thundering hooves and furious charge.

text.last_approved_text: The charge that once bolstered the Han now rides against them, sabres drawn, in the name of the Yellow Sky.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The charge that once bolstered the Han now rides against them, sabres drawn, in the name of the Yellow Sky.

text.last_approved_text: There can be no mercy for treason. Justice will be delivered at the end of these warriors' spears.

unit_description_short_texts.text: There can be no mercy for treason. Justice will be delivered at the end of these warriors' spears.

text.last_approved_text: With lances lowered and locked, these cavalrymen charge into battle for their emperor and the realm.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With lances lowered and locked, these cavalrymen charge into battle for their emperor and the realm.

text.last_approved_text: These lancers were trained and drilled by the Han's military machine. Now they turn their weapons against their former masters.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These lancers were trained and drilled by the Han's military machine. Now they turn their weapons against their former masters.

text.last_approved_text: At the head of charge they draw their spears, driving home with a righteous cry!

unit_description_short_texts.text: At the head of charge they draw their spears, driving home with a righteous cry!

text.last_approved_text: The leaders of the land are tainted by corruption, and must be cleansed with steel.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The leaders of the land are tainted by corruption, and must be cleansed with steel.

text.last_approved_text: Peace can only be attained through struggle and strife - a pair of axes are helpful in this regard.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Peace can only be attained through struggle and strife - a pair of axes are helpful in this regard.

text.last_approved_text: With a short spear in each hand, the chosen warriors stride forth, uncaring of the danger, towards destiny.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With a short spear in each hand, the chosen warriors stride forth, uncaring of the danger, towards destiny.

text.last_approved_text: The Tao is the eternal quest for enlightenment. War may not aid that quest, but it's a necessary evil all the same.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Tao is the eternal quest for enlightenment. War may not aid that quest, but it's a necessary evil all the same.

text.last_approved_text: The Old Master helped define the way. In his name, these warriors will see the world set right.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Old Master helped define the way. In his name, these warriors will see the world set right.

text.last_approved_text: In defence of the emperor, there are no lengths to which these soldiers would not go.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In defence of the emperor, there are no lengths to which these soldiers would not go.

text.last_approved_text: At the gates of the imperial palace, these warriors stand, guarding the emperor with steel brandished!

unit_description_short_texts.text: At the gates of the imperial palace, these warriors stand, guarding the emperor with steel brandished!

text.last_approved_text: The peasants, born from nothing into nothing, will see this rebellion won.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The peasants, born from nothing into nothing, will see this rebellion won.

text.last_approved_text: Those the Han call barbarians are just warriors determinedly defending their home against invaders.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Those the Han call barbarians are just warriors determinedly defending their home against invaders.

text.last_approved_text: For the crime of defying the Han, the Yellow Turbans offer a choice much preferable to the barbaric 'justice' of the state.

unit_description_short_texts.text: For the crime of defying the Han, the Yellow Turbans offer a choice much preferable to the barbaric 'justice' of the state.

text.last_approved_text: A sabre, and warrior, trained by the Han, raised by the Han, and now blooded by them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A sabre, and warrior, trained by the Han, raised by the Han, and now blooded by them.

text.last_approved_text: It is an irony above all that arrows fletched by the dynasty to destroy rebels should now be turned back on them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: It is an irony above all that arrows fletched by the dynasty to destroy rebels should now be turned back on them.

text.last_approved_text: A bow is simple to use and difficult to master. Luckily, mastery is not a requirement of participation.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A bow is simple to use and difficult to master. Luckily, mastery is not a requirement of participation.

text.last_approved_text: Prince Liu Chong seeks to make a safe land for all. His royal guard will see that vision realised.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Prince Liu Chong seeks to make a safe land for all. His royal guard will see that vision realised.

text.last_approved_text: The vast imperial palatial grounds are defended by many warriors and none more fearsome than the sword-wielding cavalry guard.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The vast imperial palatial grounds are defended by many warriors and none more fearsome than the sword-wielding cavalry guard.

text.last_approved_text: From above, tucked between battlements and leering from gatehouses, the palace crossbowmen brook no quarter for the enemies of the empire.

unit_description_short_texts.text: From above, tucked between battlements and leering from gatehouses, the palace crossbowmen brook no quarter for the enemies of the empire.

text.last_approved_text: Be they man or monster, no one can withstand the thundering force of not one, but many, ten-foot bolts.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Be they man or monster, no one can withstand the thundering force of not one, but many, ten-foot bolts.

text.last_approved_text: Patience, focus and resolve; the skills of the poacher are perfectly transferable to the needs of the battlefield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Patience, focus and resolve; the skills of the poacher are perfectly transferable to the needs of the battlefield.

text.last_approved_text: When you hunt to live, silence becomes your ally, and your bow skills become… considerable.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When you hunt to live, silence becomes your ally, and your bow skills become… considerable.

text.last_approved_text: They may not be trained in the formal ways of war, but battle will teach them... or not.

unit_description_short_texts.text: They may not be trained in the formal ways of war, but battle will teach them... or not.

text.last_approved_text: Nature must be preserved and the world saved. These warriors will see it done.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Nature must be preserved and the world saved. These warriors will see it done.

text.last_approved_text: The 'yaoguai' demons move unseen and strike with a lethality that is scarcely believable.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The 'yaoguai' demons move unseen and strike with a lethality that is scarcely believable.

text.last_approved_text: When the cause is all you know, you proclaim it to everyone you meet, even your enemies in battle.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When the cause is all you know, you proclaim it to everyone you meet, even your enemies in battle.

text.last_approved_text: The empire is above all, imbued with the will of heaven. It will be defended!

unit_description_short_texts.text: The empire is above all, imbued with the will of heaven. It will be defended!

text.last_approved_text: At the centre of the line, weapons extended, these warriors do not - cannot - flinch. Their resolve, implacable.

unit_description_short_texts.text: At the centre of the line, weapons extended, these warriors do not - cannot - flinch. Their resolve, implacable.

text.last_approved_text: Bravery drives a warrior to battle more effectively than any general; a good spear and shield keeps them there.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Bravery drives a warrior to battle more effectively than any general; a good spear and shield keeps them there.

text.last_approved_text: Every gate is its own defence, but further held by the imposing, armoured gate guards.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Every gate is its own defence, but further held by the imposing, armoured gate guards.

text.last_approved_text: The oppressed, although coerced into service by the Han dynasty, will gladly turn their weapons back on their former masters.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The oppressed, although coerced into service by the Han dynasty, will gladly turn their weapons back on their former masters.

text.last_approved_text: To truly hunt with the spear is to let it become an extension of your body, in turn making you a lethal opponent in battle.

unit_description_short_texts.text: To truly hunt with the spear is to let it become an extension of your body, in turn making you a lethal opponent in battle.

text.last_approved_text: War is a messy affair, often coming down not to who is best, but who is luckiest.

unit_description_short_texts.text: War is a messy affair, often coming down not to who is best, but who is luckiest.

text.last_approved_text: The Yellow Turbans must be sword and shield both, holding back the tide of corruption whilst simultaneously pushing it back.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Yellow Turbans must be sword and shield both, holding back the tide of corruption whilst simultaneously pushing it back.

text.last_approved_text: Put a spear in these men's hands and they will fight. Against all odds, for their homes, they will fight…

unit_description_short_texts.text: Put a spear in these men's hands and they will fight. Against all odds, for their homes, they will fight…

text.last_approved_text: A glaive is a most powerful weapon, and zealotry more powerful still.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A glaive is a most powerful weapon, and zealotry more powerful still.

text.last_approved_text: The lighter the armour, the faster the warrior, the quicker the strike, the sooner the kill.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The lighter the armour, the faster the warrior, the quicker the strike, the sooner the kill.

text.last_approved_text: In the service of their lady, these warriors will never yield to their enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In the service of their lady, these warriors will never yield to their enemies.

text.last_approved_text: These cavalry roll in like storm clouds, and strike with the force of lightning.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These cavalry roll in like storm clouds, and strike with the force of lightning.

text.last_approved_text: There is no battle line, no formation, that these warriors cannot see put to ruin.

unit_description_short_texts.text: There is no battle line, no formation, that these warriors cannot see put to ruin.

text.last_approved_text: Banditry is a simple profession – wade into battle with whichever weapon you find, and take everything you can.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Banditry is a simple profession – wade into battle with whichever weapon you find, and take everything you can.

text.last_approved_text: To break these warriors is the challenge of many an army. So far, very few have succeeded.

unit_description_short_texts.text: To break these warriors is the challenge of many an army. So far, very few have succeeded.

text.last_approved_text: When they had no home or purpose, the White Tiger provided. Now they will defend both.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When they had no home or purpose, the White Tiger provided. Now they will defend both.

text.last_approved_text: A people only truly die the last time their name is spoken. Until then, they live on.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A people only truly die the last time their name is spoken. Until then, they live on.

text.last_approved_text: "To kill a man? That's one thing. But to kill an animal? That seems another cruel business altogether."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "To kill a man? That's one thing. But to kill an animal? That seems another cruel business altogether."

text.last_approved_text: "Hold the bow steady, and don't hesitate. This is no pig you're skewering, friend."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "Hold the bow steady, and don't hesitate. This is no pig you're skewering, friend."

text.last_approved_text: The south, they say, is full of tigers, so one should take care where they wander.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The south, they say, is full of tigers, so one should take care where they wander.

text.last_approved_text: These men have basic weapons, and determination in droves. But that's essentially all they have.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These men have basic weapons, and determination in droves. But that's essentially all they have.

text.last_approved_text: All will fight in the defence of their leader, but others will fight all the more fiercely to avenge them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: All will fight in the defence of their leader, but others will fight all the more fiercely to avenge them.

text.last_approved_text: The cragged edges of the southern mountains fashion peasants into warriors, flint-eyed and sharp.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The cragged edges of the southern mountains fashion peasants into warriors, flint-eyed and sharp.

text.last_approved_text: Can any warrior stand against a charging elephant?

unit_description_short_texts.text: Can any warrior stand against a charging elephant?

text.last_approved_text: As though elephants were not mighty enough, these beasts have even more power!

unit_description_short_texts.text: As though elephants were not mighty enough, these beasts have even more power!

text.last_approved_text: A flying axe can ruin your whole day.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A flying axe can ruin your whole day.

text.last_approved_text: With the bruising mace and the burning fire, the foe is soon dealt with.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With the bruising mace and the burning fire, the foe is soon dealt with.

text.last_approved_text: The cream of Shamoke's forces.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The cream of Shamoke's forces.

text.last_approved_text: The men of the south have always fought to protect what they hold dear.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The men of the south have always fought to protect what they hold dear.

text.last_approved_text: The men of the south have always fought to protect what they hold dear.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The men of the south have always fought to protect what they hold dear.

text.last_approved_text: The greatest warriors of one of the greatest leaders of the Nanman.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The greatest warriors of one of the greatest leaders of the Nanman.

text.last_approved_text: In case the foe survives a charging elephant, the Ravine Warriors follow in the beasts' wake, a weapon in each hand.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In case the foe survives a charging elephant, the Ravine Warriors follow in the beasts' wake, a weapon in each hand.

text.last_approved_text: The tiger is the lord of beasts. In war, the mere sight of such a creature can unman the bravest warrior.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The tiger is the lord of beasts. In war, the mere sight of such a creature can unman the bravest warrior.

text.last_approved_text: Though their origins may be humble, the warriors of the Nanman can hold their own.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though their origins may be humble, the warriors of the Nanman can hold their own.

text.last_approved_text: The axe is one of the few weapons well-suited to both missile and melee combat.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The axe is one of the few weapons well-suited to both missile and melee combat.

text.last_approved_text: Fighting on to the last, unafraid of any enemy, these warriors are the bane of presumptuous heroes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Fighting on to the last, unafraid of any enemy, these warriors are the bane of presumptuous heroes.

text.last_approved_text: A concerted volley of arrows is bad enough. When the arrows are on fire, it is time to run.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A concerted volley of arrows is bad enough. When the arrows are on fire, it is time to run.

text.last_approved_text: Foes may survive the blowpipe attack only to fall under the blades of the machetes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Foes may survive the blowpipe attack only to fall under the blades of the machetes.

text.last_approved_text: When the fight comes to them, these javelineers are too canny to leave themselves defenceless.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When the fight comes to them, these javelineers are too canny to leave themselves defenceless.

text.last_approved_text: Sometimes brute strength and relentless force will win the day.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Sometimes brute strength and relentless force will win the day.

text.last_approved_text: Do not doubt the efficacy of a barrage of well-aimed sling-shots.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Do not doubt the efficacy of a barrage of well-aimed sling-shots.

text.last_approved_text: Any army that marches with elephants already have superiority when it comes to morale.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Any army that marches with elephants already have superiority when it comes to morale.

text.last_approved_text: No matter the size of the hunter's prey, a well-aimed dart tipped with a sufficiently strong poison can take them down.

unit_description_short_texts.text: No matter the size of the hunter's prey, a well-aimed dart tipped with a sufficiently strong poison can take them down.

text.last_approved_text: When a tiger leads the charge, foes rarely look beyond the fearsome beast – which may be their last mistake!

unit_description_short_texts.text: When a tiger leads the charge, foes rarely look beyond the fearsome beast – which may be their last mistake!

text.last_approved_text: They dart in, self assured and sure-footed, pelt the enemy, and are gone.

unit_description_short_texts.text: They dart in, self assured and sure-footed, pelt the enemy, and are gone.

text.last_approved_text: Yang Feng expects his troops to be the best, and he will not be disappointed.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Yang Feng expects his troops to be the best, and he will not be disappointed.

text.last_approved_text: Do not be fooled by the length of those spears: they can still be thrown.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Do not be fooled by the length of those spears: they can still be thrown.

text.last_approved_text: In defence of their lands, the Nanman muster their spears.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In defence of their lands, the Nanman muster their spears.

text.last_approved_text: A phalanx of spears will see off most enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A phalanx of spears will see off most enemies.

text.last_approved_text: Stealthy and skilled, when their spears strike true, expect pain.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Stealthy and skilled, when their spears strike true, expect pain.

text.last_approved_text: Infantry as stalwart and unshakable as the mountains themselves.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Infantry as stalwart and unshakable as the mountains themselves.

text.last_approved_text: High blood drumming on the skin. They're on the hunt…

unit_description_short_texts.text: High blood drumming on the skin. They're on the hunt…

text.last_approved_text: Complete victory only comes from ruthless determination, usually found at the end of a blade.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Complete victory only comes from ruthless determination, usually found at the end of a blade.

text.last_approved_text: What the cavalry charge begins, the sabre will surely finish.

unit_description_short_texts.text: What the cavalry charge begins, the sabre will surely finish.

text.last_approved_text: "The charge? Oh the charge is only the beginning…"

unit_description_short_texts.text: "The charge? Oh the charge is only the beginning…"

text.last_approved_text: Though not yet as potent as their elite cousins, the cubs are no less powerful in themselves.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though not yet as potent as their elite cousins, the cubs are no less powerful in themselves.

text.last_approved_text: A power contained is not a power tamed; this tribal fury can now simply be directed where its master desires.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A power contained is not a power tamed; this tribal fury can now simply be directed where its master desires.

text.last_approved_text: If the initial charge does not break the foe, the follow-up soon will.

unit_description_short_texts.text: If the initial charge does not break the foe, the follow-up soon will.

text.last_approved_text: To lead where others follow is the domain of the truly elite.

unit_description_short_texts.text: To lead where others follow is the domain of the truly elite.

text.last_approved_text: To these renowned warriors, the lance is simply a lethal extension of the arm.

unit_description_short_texts.text: To these renowned warriors, the lance is simply a lethal extension of the arm.

text.last_approved_text: There is, it would seem, no better plan than to do or to die.

unit_description_short_texts.text: There is, it would seem, no better plan than to do or to die.

text.last_approved_text: Let the rattle of countless sabres presage war's coming.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Let the rattle of countless sabres presage war's coming.

text.last_approved_text: "Let our foes advance. They will soon feel the bite of our blades."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "Let our foes advance. They will soon feel the bite of our blades."

text.last_approved_text: Battle has not dulled these blades, nor the resolves of their bearers.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Battle has not dulled these blades, nor the resolves of their bearers.

text.last_approved_text: In the name of the cause they lost, the fight will continue, no matter how hopeless.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In the name of the cause they lost, the fight will continue, no matter how hopeless.

text.last_approved_text: Little strikes fear into an enemy like a hail of arrows blocking out the sun.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Little strikes fear into an enemy like a hail of arrows blocking out the sun.

text.last_approved_text: Ride. Fire. Feign retreat. Repeat.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Ride. Fire. Feign retreat. Repeat.

text.last_approved_text: Let the thunder of hooves rise and fall like a summer storm, and be gone just as swiftly.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Let the thunder of hooves rise and fall like a summer storm, and be gone just as swiftly.

text.last_approved_text: It is often the thud of crossbow bolts into the enemy that signals the onset of battle.

unit_description_short_texts.text: It is often the thud of crossbow bolts into the enemy that signals the onset of battle.

text.last_approved_text: "If they do not yet fear us, they will soon learn to."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "If they do not yet fear us, they will soon learn to."

text.last_approved_text: Theirs are the spears that guard the realm of Han.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Theirs are the spears that guard the realm of Han.

text.last_approved_text: "Let our enemies know that we do not fear, and we do not falter."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "Let our enemies know that we do not fear, and we do not falter."

text.last_approved_text: Spears in hand, the indomitable defenders of the north stand resolute.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Spears in hand, the indomitable defenders of the north stand resolute.

text.last_approved_text: These spears hold fast against whatever lies beyond that misted, dotted line.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These spears hold fast against whatever lies beyond that misted, dotted line.

text.last_approved_text: "There are powers in the mountains – you are all that holds them back."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "There are powers in the mountains – you are all that holds them back."

text.last_approved_text: "Stand firm, friends. We will show you how it's done!"

unit_description_short_texts.text: "Stand firm, friends. We will show you how it's done!"

text.last_approved_text: These warriors will raise their halberds once more, if not for their cause then for themselves.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These warriors will raise their halberds once more, if not for their cause then for themselves.

text.last_approved_text: To live, for these warriors, is to fight, even though the cause is long past.

unit_description_short_texts.text: To live, for these warriors, is to fight, even though the cause is long past.

text.last_approved_text: These troops are so well armed that the most valued strategic locations should be entrusted to their defence.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These troops are so well armed that the most valued strategic locations should be entrusted to their defence.

text.last_approved_text: Masters of defence who wield jian swords and rattan shields to hold the line against almost all enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Masters of defence who wield jian swords and rattan shields to hold the line against almost all enemies.

text.last_approved_text: Masters of defence who wield jian swords and rattan shields to hold the line against almost all enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Masters of defence who wield jian swords and rattan shields to hold the line against almost all enemies.

text.last_approved_text: These mounted troops hunt down skirmishers; protecting against missiles with shields and using zhibeidao swords to chop at the enemy.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These mounted troops hunt down skirmishers; protecting against missiles with shields and using zhibeidao swords to chop at the enemy.

text.last_approved_text: Merciless tribal cavalry, crashing into enemies with a devastating charge and dispatching any survivors with swords.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Merciless tribal cavalry, crashing into enemies with a devastating charge and dispatching any survivors with swords.

text.last_approved_text: These cavalry troops are armed with zhibeidao swords to neutralise archers and combat enemy cavalry units alike.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These cavalry troops are armed with zhibeidao swords to neutralise archers and combat enemy cavalry units alike.

text.last_approved_text: Elite infantry who cross all terrain types with ease, only to furiously attack enemy infantry with their axes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Elite infantry who cross all terrain types with ease, only to furiously attack enemy infantry with their axes.

text.last_approved_text: Clad in full armour, these elite cavalry troops deflect arrows with their shields as they bear down on their enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Clad in full armour, these elite cavalry troops deflect arrows with their shields as they bear down on their enemies.

text.last_approved_text: The best riders are rewarded with iron armour to maximise their devastating flanking charge.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The best riders are rewarded with iron armour to maximise their devastating flanking charge.

text.last_approved_text: Hand-picked by the general, these seasoned shock-troops relentlessly batter enemy lines with all the fury of their namesake.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hand-picked by the general, these seasoned shock-troops relentlessly batter enemy lines with all the fury of their namesake.

text.last_approved_text: Warriors chosen for the bravery needed to charge headlong into the enemy, polearms thrust to the fore.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Warriors chosen for the bravery needed to charge headlong into the enemy, polearms thrust to the fore.

text.last_approved_text: Warriors chosen for the bravery needed to charge headlong into the enemy, polearms thrust to the fore.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Warriors chosen for the bravery needed to charge headlong into the enemy, polearms thrust to the fore.

text.last_approved_text: Cavalry troops who fight only for gold; excellent at capturing key strategic points and fighting in hot climates.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Cavalry troops who fight only for gold; excellent at capturing key strategic points and fighting in hot climates.

text.last_approved_text: Cavalry troops who fight only for gold; excellent at capturing key strategic points and fighting in hot climates.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Cavalry troops who fight only for gold; excellent at capturing key strategic points and fighting in hot climates.

text.last_approved_text: With ji polearms thrust ahead, these cavalry troops break enemy lines with a headlong charge.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With ji polearms thrust ahead, these cavalry troops break enemy lines with a headlong charge.

text.last_approved_text: Seizing their only chance for glory, these mounted peasants charge headlong into foes and chase down fleeing enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Seizing their only chance for glory, these mounted peasants charge headlong into foes and chase down fleeing enemies.

text.last_approved_text: Tribal horsemen whose ferocity and unrelenting attacks on exposed flanks are matched only by their riding skills.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Tribal horsemen whose ferocity and unrelenting attacks on exposed flanks are matched only by their riding skills.

text.last_approved_text: Cavalry troops that rely on the speed of their mounts to charge into lightly-armoured enemies and chase down fleeing enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Cavalry troops that rely on the speed of their mounts to charge into lightly-armoured enemies and chase down fleeing enemies.

text.last_approved_text: Equipped with partial iron armour and highly-protective shields, these disciplined elite cavalry hunt down enemies armed with missile weapons.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Equipped with partial iron armour and highly-protective shields, these disciplined elite cavalry hunt down enemies armed with missile weapons.

text.last_approved_text: Trained in the tradition of nomadic horsemen, the speed and power of this cavalry’s charge scatter all before it.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Trained in the tradition of nomadic horsemen, the speed and power of this cavalry’s charge scatter all before it.

text.last_approved_text: Hardened by the bandit life, the furious charge of these axe-swinging troops is deadly to enemy infantry.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hardened by the bandit life, the furious charge of these axe-swinging troops is deadly to enemy infantry.

text.last_approved_text: Years of banditry have enabled these troops to sneak behind enemy lines, striking at unsuspecting foes and capturing strategic points.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Years of banditry have enabled these troops to sneak behind enemy lines, striking at unsuspecting foes and capturing strategic points.

text.last_approved_text: These elite, battle-hardened bandits carry an axe in each hand, and advance ahead of the front lines to catch their foes unawares

unit_description_short_texts.text: These elite, battle-hardened bandits carry an axe in each hand, and advance ahead of the front lines to catch their foes unawares

text.last_approved_text: Zheng Jiang arms her fiercest bandits with fu axes and deploys them to charge into enemy infantry.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Zheng Jiang arms her fiercest bandits with fu axes and deploys them to charge into enemy infantry.

text.last_approved_text: Few have the skills to master the ancient fighting style of the jian sword while parrying blows with a shield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Few have the skills to master the ancient fighting style of the jian sword while parrying blows with a shield.

text.last_approved_text: Few have the skills to master the ancient fighting style of the jian sword while parrying blows with a shield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Few have the skills to master the ancient fighting style of the jian sword while parrying blows with a shield.

text.last_approved_text: Infantry-for-hire, they easily weather hot climates and are best used to capture key strategic points on the battlefield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Infantry-for-hire, they easily weather hot climates and are best used to capture key strategic points on the battlefield.

text.last_approved_text: Infantry-for-hire that can easily weather hot climates. They are used to capture key strategic points on the battlefield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Infantry-for-hire that can easily weather hot climates. They are used to capture key strategic points on the battlefield.

text.last_approved_text: Elite warriors that parry and block projectiles with polearms before answering with a devastating charge.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Elite warriors that parry and block projectiles with polearms before answering with a devastating charge.

text.last_approved_text: These troops have been selected for their skill in the ancient fighting style with the jian sword - a deadly weapon when mastered.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These troops have been selected for their skill in the ancient fighting style with the jian sword - a deadly weapon when mastered.

text.last_approved_text: Well-trained armoured infantry, carrying rattan shields and zhibeidao swords for close combat with enemy infantry.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Well-trained armoured infantry, carrying rattan shields and zhibeidao swords for close combat with enemy infantry.

text.last_approved_text: Assault infantry armed with zhibeidao swords to break enemy spear lines.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Assault infantry armed with zhibeidao swords to break enemy spear lines.

text.last_approved_text: Many enemies fall to the jian blades of these elite, heavily-armoured swordsmen defending the line in service of Yuan Shu.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Many enemies fall to the jian blades of these elite, heavily-armoured swordsmen defending the line in service of Yuan Shu.

text.last_approved_text: Archers equipped with composite bows for long-range harassment of enemies and basic zhibeidao swords for close combat defence.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Archers equipped with composite bows for long-range harassment of enemies and basic zhibeidao swords for close combat defence.

text.last_approved_text: Archers equipped with composite bows for long-range harassment of enemies and basic zhibeidao swords for close combat defence.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Archers equipped with composite bows for long-range harassment of enemies and basic zhibeidao swords for close combat defence.

text.last_approved_text: Highly-trained bowmen who excel when unleashing rapid volleys of arrows to slow and supress cavalry charges.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Highly-trained bowmen who excel when unleashing rapid volleys of arrows to slow and supress cavalry charges.

text.last_approved_text: Fearless bandits armed with axes and composite bows; accuracy is less vital when you can sneak up on the enemy.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Fearless bandits armed with axes and composite bows; accuracy is less vital when you can sneak up on the enemy.

text.last_approved_text: Soldiers armed with long-range crossbows powerful enough to pierce enemy armour and defences.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Soldiers armed with long-range crossbows powerful enough to pierce enemy armour and defences.

text.last_approved_text: Elite archers hand-picked by the emperor for their versatility and excellence.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Elite archers hand-picked by the emperor for their versatility and excellence.

text.last_approved_text: These elite soldiers are armed with long-range crossbows powerful enough to pierce armour.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These elite soldiers are armed with long-range crossbows powerful enough to pierce armour.

text.last_approved_text: Heavily-armoured troops carrying long-range crossbows powerful enough to pierce enemy armour.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Heavily-armoured troops carrying long-range crossbows powerful enough to pierce enemy armour.

text.last_approved_text: These troops' rapid-firing repeating crossbows lay waste to scores of enemies, while iron armour protects them against retaliatory fire.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These troops' rapid-firing repeating crossbows lay waste to scores of enemies, while iron armour protects them against retaliatory fire.

text.last_approved_text: Arid heat has no effect on the performance or accuracy of these archers, who excel in capturing key strategic points.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Arid heat has no effect on the performance or accuracy of these archers, who excel in capturing key strategic points.

text.last_approved_text: Arid heat has no effect on the performance or accuracy of these archers, who excel in capturing key strategic points.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Arid heat has no effect on the performance or accuracy of these archers, who excel in capturing key strategic points.

text.last_approved_text: Armoured cavalry archers who harass the enemy with arrows while using their mounts to remain out of reach.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Armoured cavalry archers who harass the enemy with arrows while using their mounts to remain out of reach.

text.last_approved_text: Onyx Dragons are as adept at swinging their blades as pulling their bows; elite and versatile infantry.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Onyx Dragons are as adept at swinging their blades as pulling their bows; elite and versatile infantry.

text.last_approved_text: Tribal archers who excel at skirmishing due to their accuracy, endless endurance and long polearms to counter enemy cavalry assaults.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Tribal archers who excel at skirmishing due to their accuracy, endless endurance and long polearms to counter enemy cavalry assaults.

text.last_approved_text: These troops are armed with fast-loading, repeating crossbows to quickly shoot down their foes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These troops are armed with fast-loading, repeating crossbows to quickly shoot down their foes.

text.last_approved_text: These elite troops’ armour protects them in close combat, enabling them to fight when not using their long-range, armour-piercing crossbows.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These elite troops’ armour protects them in close combat, enabling them to fight when not using their long-range, armour-piercing crossbows.

text.last_approved_text: Hurling large, heavy projectiles to breach enemy defences from afar requires quite a feat of engineering.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hurling large, heavy projectiles to breach enemy defences from afar requires quite a feat of engineering.

text.last_approved_text: Hand-picked by Gongsun Zan, these elite cavalry archers ride white horses and harass enemies while remaining out of reach.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hand-picked by Gongsun Zan, these elite cavalry archers ride white horses and harass enemies while remaining out of reach.

text.last_approved_text: Hand-picked by Gongsun Zan, these elite cavalry archers ride white horses and harass enemies while remaining out of reach.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hand-picked by Gongsun Zan, these elite cavalry archers ride white horses and harass enemies while remaining out of reach.

text.last_approved_text: These archers’ long siyah horn bows increase the velocity of their arrows, while they fend off attackers with zhibeidao swords.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These archers’ long siyah horn bows increase the velocity of their arrows, while they fend off attackers with zhibeidao swords.

text.last_approved_text: Highly-trained archers outfitted with leather armour and armed with zhibeidao swords to defend against infantry attacks.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Highly-trained archers outfitted with leather armour and armed with zhibeidao swords to defend against infantry attacks.

text.last_approved_text: The reach of these warriors extends and contracts; accuracy with the bow and spear targets distant and nearby enemies alike.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The reach of these warriors extends and contracts; accuracy with the bow and spear targets distant and nearby enemies alike.

text.last_approved_text: Fearless bandits unafraid to brace themselves against heavy cavalry and pierce horses’ armour with their long qiang spears.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Fearless bandits unafraid to brace themselves against heavy cavalry and pierce horses’ armour with their long qiang spears.

text.last_approved_text: Heavily-armoured infantry that hold the main battle line with polearms from Yuan Shao’s personal armoury.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Heavily-armoured infantry that hold the main battle line with polearms from Yuan Shao’s personal armoury.

text.last_approved_text: Heavily-armoured masters of the polearm, these warriors hold the main battle line.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Heavily-armoured masters of the polearm, these warriors hold the main battle line.

text.last_approved_text: Clad in iron, these warriors use robust tower shields to defend and hold the line at all costs.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Clad in iron, these warriors use robust tower shields to defend and hold the line at all costs.

text.last_approved_text: Elite spear infantry hand-picked by Liu Biao to defend and hold the line behind their robust tower shields.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Elite spear infantry hand-picked by Liu Biao to defend and hold the line behind their robust tower shields.

text.last_approved_text: The infantry of Jing are charged by Liu Biao to guard the flanks against enemy missiles and brace their spears against cavalry charges.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The infantry of Jing are charged by Liu Biao to guard the flanks against enemy missiles and brace their spears against cavalry charges.

text.last_approved_text: Infantry armed with polearms to pierce the armour of heavy cavalry, while their armour protects them against enemy missiles.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Infantry armed with polearms to pierce the armour of heavy cavalry, while their armour protects them against enemy missiles.

text.last_approved_text: With spears thrust to the fore, these iron-clad warriors target armoured enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With spears thrust to the fore, these iron-clad warriors target armoured enemies.

text.last_approved_text: Peasant militia armed with polearms; an expendable but versatile main force on the frontlines.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Peasant militia armed with polearms; an expendable but versatile main force on the frontlines.

text.last_approved_text: Leaving behind the fields to swell the ranks, these peasants are armed with long spears to defend against cavalry charges.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Leaving behind the fields to swell the ranks, these peasants are armed with long spears to defend against cavalry charges.

text.last_approved_text: Personally selected by the emperor, these heavily-armoured warriors are the vanguard of the frontline.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Personally selected by the emperor, these heavily-armoured warriors are the vanguard of the frontline.

text.last_approved_text: These infantry protect the flanks; their shields guard against enemy missiles, while enemy cavalry skewer themselves on their spears.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These infantry protect the flanks; their shields guard against enemy missiles, while enemy cavalry skewer themselves on their spears.

text.last_approved_text: With spears thrust to the fore, these iron-clad warriors target armoured enemies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With spears thrust to the fore, these iron-clad warriors target armoured enemies.

text.last_approved_text: Selected by Yuan Shao, the Warriors of Ye are protected by iron armour and use their polearms to pierce heavy cavalry's armour.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Selected by Yuan Shao, the Warriors of Ye are protected by iron armour and use their polearms to pierce heavy cavalry's armour.

text.last_approved_text: Elite cavalry guards who have turned their weapons against their former masters to serve the Yellow Turbans.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Elite cavalry guards who have turned their weapons against their former masters to serve the Yellow Turbans.

text.last_approved_text: Strength and courage are not everything; sometimes speed makes all the difference, and this marauding cavalry has very fast horses.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Strength and courage are not everything; sometimes speed makes all the difference, and this marauding cavalry has very fast horses.

text.last_approved_text: Seasoned shock cavalry whose speed and powerful charge make them perfect for battering enemy lines before withdrawing to strike again.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Seasoned shock cavalry whose speed and powerful charge make them perfect for battering enemy lines before withdrawing to strike again.

text.last_approved_text: The imposing bulk of this elite infantry gives their swung maces the power of a gale, scattering their enemies before them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The imposing bulk of this elite infantry gives their swung maces the power of a gale, scattering their enemies before them.

text.last_approved_text: Devotees to the Great Peace who raise the spirits of their fighting allies with Taoist chants and incantations.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Devotees to the Great Peace who raise the spirits of their fighting allies with Taoist chants and incantations.

text.last_approved_text: With low morale and armed only with improvised clubs, these starving peasants may not be formidable, but they are many!

unit_description_short_texts.text: With low morale and armed only with improvised clubs, these starving peasants may not be formidable, but they are many!

text.last_approved_text: Merchants and craftsmen armed with looted sabres and armour, fuelled by a righteous fury against injustice.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Merchants and craftsmen armed with looted sabres and armour, fuelled by a righteous fury against injustice.

text.last_approved_text: Elite warriors whose belief and commitment to the Way inspires others and gives extra weight to the swing of their twin sabres.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Elite warriors whose belief and commitment to the Way inspires others and gives extra weight to the swing of their twin sabres.

text.last_approved_text: Shamans who can take many blows before they fall, striking fear into the hearts of foes who believe they possess supernatural powers.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Shamans who can take many blows before they fall, striking fear into the hearts of foes who believe they possess supernatural powers.

text.last_approved_text: Veteran rebels armed with a sabre, shield and a swift, strong charge.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Veteran rebels armed with a sabre, shield and a swift, strong charge.

text.last_approved_text: Fearless heralds of the Yellow Sky, whose powerful charge strikes down all who would oppose the Great Peace.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Fearless heralds of the Yellow Sky, whose powerful charge strikes down all who would oppose the Great Peace.

text.last_approved_text: These former bandits obey a greater law and lend their sabres and hard-fought experience to the Yellow Turban cause.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These former bandits obey a greater law and lend their sabres and hard-fought experience to the Yellow Turban cause.

text.last_approved_text: With a tally of many victories between them, this armoured infantry form the vanguard of the frontline with sword and shield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With a tally of many victories between them, this armoured infantry form the vanguard of the frontline with sword and shield.

text.last_approved_text: Archers with an unerring eye; their arrows rarely miss their targets.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Archers with an unerring eye; their arrows rarely miss their targets.

text.last_approved_text: The quarry of these mounted archers was once waterfowl, but is now considerably larger, which only makes for an easier target.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The quarry of these mounted archers was once waterfowl, but is now considerably larger, which only makes for an easier target.

text.last_approved_text: Former poachers renowned for their stealth and skill with the bow, making them excellent ambushers.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Former poachers renowned for their stealth and skill with the bow, making them excellent ambushers.

text.last_approved_text: Cheap to raise, but low in morale, these peasants are armed with only a simple bow and the will to fight for the promise of the Yellow Sky.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Cheap to raise, but low in morale, these peasants are armed with only a simple bow and the will to fight for the promise of the Yellow Sky.

text.last_approved_text: Well-trained infantry using powerful crossbows at long range, but also skilled with armour and shield in close combat.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Well-trained infantry using powerful crossbows at long range, but also skilled with armour and shield in close combat.

text.last_approved_text: After years of ambushing traders, these former bandits now train their arrows on the oppressors of the land.

unit_description_short_texts.text: After years of ambushing traders, these former bandits now train their arrows on the oppressors of the land.

text.last_approved_text: Skilled militia armed with polearms and bows, a flexible and effective unit for combat both close and from afar.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Skilled militia armed with polearms and bows, a flexible and effective unit for combat both close and from afar.

text.last_approved_text: Armoured former palace guards who use ji polearms raided from their previous masters in the fight for the Great Peace.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Armoured former palace guards who use ji polearms raided from their previous masters in the fight for the Great Peace.

text.last_approved_text: Martial arts training has given these warriors unmatched stamina and made them experts users of the staff for attacking and defending.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Martial arts training has given these warriors unmatched stamina and made them experts users of the staff for attacking and defending.

text.last_approved_text: Forsaking farming tools for sharpened bamboo stakes, these peasants are cheap, with low morale, but risk their lives to fight against oppression.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Forsaking farming tools for sharpened bamboo stakes, these peasants are cheap, with low morale, but risk their lives to fight against oppression.

text.last_approved_text: This infantry gathers equipment dropped or left behind in battle to help their brothers and sisters continue the fight.

unit_description_short_texts.text: This infantry gathers equipment dropped or left behind in battle to help their brothers and sisters continue the fight.

text.last_approved_text: Protected by leather armour and a small shield, these former bandits brace for impact against cavalry charges.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Protected by leather armour and a small shield, these former bandits brace for impact against cavalry charges.

text.last_approved_text: It takes a very steady hand, supreme patience, and expert timing to land a shot as accurately as these bowmen.

unit_description_short_texts.text: It takes a very steady hand, supreme patience, and expert timing to land a shot as accurately as these bowmen.

text.last_approved_text: The horse is made only more terrifying by cladding it in armour and directing it at the enemy.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The horse is made only more terrifying by cladding it in armour and directing it at the enemy.

text.last_approved_text: These swordsmen take the fight to the enemy in the name of their prince!

unit_description_short_texts.text: These swordsmen take the fight to the enemy in the name of their prince!

text.last_approved_text: These spearmen are trained to hold the line, thrusting out at any who would oppose them, or their lord!

unit_description_short_texts.text: These spearmen are trained to hold the line, thrusting out at any who would oppose them, or their lord!

text.last_approved_text: The dao is an elegant weapon. Simply made, for a simple purpose: death.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The dao is an elegant weapon. Simply made, for a simple purpose: death.

text.last_approved_text: The swing of a dao, from horseback, is the last thing many see before their head is cleaved from their neck.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The swing of a dao, from horseback, is the last thing many see before their head is cleaved from their neck.

text.last_approved_text: These archers excel at harassing enemy troops, but are unafraid of charging into the melee if needed.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These archers excel at harassing enemy troops, but are unafraid of charging into the melee if needed.

text.last_approved_text: In defence of the emperor, there is no lengths to which these soldiers would not go.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In defence of the emperor, there is no lengths to which these soldiers would not go.

text.last_approved_text: A crossbow is an effective and deadly weapon. So, too, a horse.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A crossbow is an effective and deadly weapon. So, too, a horse.

text.last_approved_text: Against the toughest armour, a crossbow bolt will still slow you down. Against the defenceless, however…

unit_description_short_texts.text: Against the toughest armour, a crossbow bolt will still slow you down. Against the defenceless, however…

text.last_approved_text: Movement is its own form of strength. What this unit may lack in armour it makes up for in versatility.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Movement is its own form of strength. What this unit may lack in armour it makes up for in versatility.

text.last_approved_text: A good axe and a strong arm are as good as any spear, sword or bow.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A good axe and a strong arm are as good as any spear, sword or bow.

text.last_approved_text: The Xianbei were infamous, feared for their lightning-fast attacks and ceaseless harassment of their foes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Xianbei were infamous, feared for their lightning-fast attacks and ceaseless harassment of their foes.

text.last_approved_text: Light, manoeuvrable cavalry can create chaos and confusion in the enemy ranks and, ultimately, victory.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Light, manoeuvrable cavalry can create chaos and confusion in the enemy ranks and, ultimately, victory.

text.last_approved_text: Nomads, masters of cavalry, know exactly how, and where, to deploy their armoured horses for maximum devastation.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Nomads, masters of cavalry, know exactly how, and where, to deploy their armoured horses for maximum devastation.

text.last_approved_text: Those from beyond our borders may seem strange, but if they fight well it is better that they are on our side.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Those from beyond our borders may seem strange, but if they fight well it is better that they are on our side.

text.last_approved_text: Swift movement and deadly action are the essence of war. These warriors are fast as lightning, and just as lethal.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Swift movement and deadly action are the essence of war. These warriors are fast as lightning, and just as lethal.
